name: occamy
description: the occamy grows or shrinks in order to fit available space

scripts.distribute: command -v uglifyjs >/dev/null 2>&1 || npm i -g uglify-js; uglifyjs src/occamy.js --compress --mangle --warn --output dist/occamy.min.js; command -v zopfli >/dev/null 2>&1 && zopfli --i100 dist/occamy.min.js

author: yetzt <node@yetzt.me>
